name: Hummus
description: A creamy dip made from chickpeas, perfect as a spread or side.
instruction: Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil until smooth. Season with salt.

name: Soy Beef Soup
description: A hearty soup made with soy protein and vegetables.
instruction: Simmer soy protein with vegetables and seasonings in broth until tender.

name: Tofu Broccoli Stew
description: A comforting stew of tofu and broccoli in a savory broth.
instruction: Simmer tofu and broccoli in a broth of soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.

name: Noodle Wok
description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables in a savory sauce.
instruction: Stir-fry vegetables and noodles, then add soy sauce, sesame oil, and seasonings.

name: Vegan Mushroom Stew
description: A rich and creamy stew made with a variety of mushrooms.
instruction: Cook mushrooms with onions and garlic, then add vegetable broth and seasonings.

name: Chicken with Potato
description: Tender chicken served with roasted potatoes.
instruction: Roast chicken and potatoes with herbs until golden and cooked through.

name: Chicken with Penne Pasta
description: Juicy chicken paired with penne pasta in a creamy sauce.
instruction: Cook chicken and pasta, then combine with a creamy sauce of your choice.

name: Sausage with Meatballs
description: Savory sausages and meatballs served with your choice of side.
instruction: Fry sausages and meatballs until golden and cooked through.

name: Avocado Toast
description: A simple and healthy breakfast of avocado on toast.
instruction: Mash avocado and spread on toasted bread. Top with seasoning or toppings of choice.

name: Pasta Bolognese
description: A rich and hearty meat sauce served with pasta.
instruction: Cook ground meat with tomatoes and seasonings, then serve over pasta.

name: Chickpea
description: A simple dish featuring chickpeas, rich in protein and flavor.
instruction: Sauté chickpeas with your favorite spices or serve them in a salad.

name: Couscous with Carrot and Tomatoes
description: A flavorful couscous dish with fresh carrots and tomatoes.
instruction: Cook couscous and toss with sautéed carrots and tomatoes.

name: Rice and Chickpea
description: A filling dish with rice and chickpeas, full of protein.
instruction: Cook rice and mix with cooked chickpeas and seasonings.

name: Plant Based Mix
description: A nutritious mix of plant-based ingredients, perfect for a quick meal.
instruction: Mix your favorite plant-based ingredients like tofu, beans, and vegetables.

name: Couscous, Chickpea, and Grilled Tomato
description: A delicious combination of couscous, chickpeas, and grilled tomatoes.
instruction: Cook couscous, grill tomatoes, and mix with chickpeas and seasonings.

name: Aubergine Stew with Rice
description: A flavorful aubergine stew served with rice.
instruction: Cook aubergines in a savory stew, then serve over rice.

name: Fried Fish with Potato
description: A crispy fried fish served with a side of potatoes.
instruction: Fry the fish until golden and serve with boiled or roasted potatoes.

name: Fried Cod with Rice
description: Golden fried cod served with steamed rice.
instruction: Fry cod fillets and serve with steamed rice and vegetables.

name: Salmon with Mashed Potato
description: A flavorful salmon fillet served with creamy mashed potatoes.
instruction: Pan-sear or bake salmon and serve with mashed potatoes.

name: Salmon with Boiled Potato
description: Healthy salmon paired with boiled potatoes.
instruction: Cook salmon and serve with boiled potatoes and a side salad.

name: Cod with Couscous
description: Light and flaky cod served with couscous.
instruction: Cook cod fillets and serve over couscous with vegetables.
